changeSet.author: camille.petitalot@volcamp.io
changeSet.comment: Talk Speakers - Intro Volcamp 2025

column.name: talk_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM talks WHERE title = 'Intro Volcamp 2025' AND conference_id = (SELECT id FROM conferences WHERE name = 'Volcamp 2025'))

column.name: speaker_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM speakers WHERE name = 'Volcamp team' AND conference_id = (SELECT id FROM conferences WHERE name = 'Volcamp 2025'))
